thread.title_full: Fox News Quietly Settled Sexual Harassment Allegations Against Bill O'Reilly - BuzzFeed News

author: Ema O'Connor
title: Fox News Quietly Settled Sexual Harassment Allegations Against Bill O'Reilly - BuzzFeed News
text:
Abernethy with his wife. Lucy Nicholson / Reuters ID: 10300287 She also claimed Abernethy “constantly called her at the office and asking her to come by his office,” and attempted to pursue a “personal” relationship with her.
It’s is not the first time O’Reilly has been accused of sexual harassment. In 2004, one of his producers, Andrea Mackris, claimed in a lawsuit that he made phone calls during which it sounded like he was masturbating, repeatedly told her to buy a vibrator, and relayed multiple sexual fantasies about her. After O’Reilly settled for millions of dollars, both sides claimed there was no wrongdoing.
